error.signature: Error: write after end in API route
error.regex: (write after end|Cannot set headers after they are sent)

verdict.summary: API route sends response twice â€” usually a missing return after res.json().

dead_ends.action: Adding res.headersSent check before every response
dead_ends.why_fails: Band-aid; masks the control flow bug
The second write is intentional code, not an exception

workarounds.action: Add return after res.json()/res.send(): return res.json({ ok: true })
workarounds.how: return prevents execution of code below that would send another response

workarounds.action: Refactor to single response point at the end of the handler
workarounds.how: Collect the response data in a variable and send once at the end
